title: Philips Norelco Multigroom 5000 Trimmer
description: Walmart offers the Philips Norelco Multigroom Series 5000 Trimmer for $20. (Amazon charges the same.) Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping charge. That's tied with our mention from last week as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal we could find now by $7.) The set includes 18 pieces.

title: Christmas Items at Home Depot
description:
Home Depot takes 50% to 75% off a selection of Christmas trees, lighting, and decor. Choose ship-to-store pickup to dodge shipping fees, which start at $5.99, or bag free shipping on orders of $45 or more. (Certain items qualify for no-minimum free shipping.) A couple of best bets:
  • LightShow Holiday Projection RGB Ribbon Light 2-Pack for $4.97 ($15 off)
  • Martha Stewart Living 7.5-ft. Indoor Snowy Norwegian Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Clear Lights for $249.50 (pictured, $250 off)

title: Rain-X Latitude Wiper Blades at Amazon
description:
At Amazon, buy any two Rain-X wiper blades, and get $5 off a future purchase at Amazon. (After your order ships you'll receive a code for $5 off a future purchase.) Plus, Prime members receive free shipping on all orders. Deal ends January 1. Some best bets, before discount:
  • Rain-X Water 26" Repellency 2-in-1 Wiper Blade for $14.97 (pictured)
  • Rain-X 17" Latitude Wiper Blade for $14.97

title: T-Fal 3-Piece Nonstick Fry Pan Set
description:
As one of its daily deals, Macy's offers the T-Fal 3-Piece Nonstick Fry Pan Set for $14.99. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. Minus padding, that's tied with our mention from two weeks ago as the best non-rebate price we've seen for this set. (Outside of the deal below, it's $15 under the lowest price we could find for a similar 3-piece set.) It includes 8", 9.5", and 12" pans, all of which are dishwasher-safe and oven-safe to 350°. Deal ends today.

Note that Amazon charges the same, with free shipping for Prime members.

title: Breville Nespresso Creatista Plus
description: Amazon offers the Breville Nespresso Creatista Plus Espresso and Coffee Maker for $329.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $89. It features auto-frothing with eight texture levels and 11 milk temperature settings, multiple beverage selections, an LCD display, 1.5-liter water tank, and 19 bars of pressure.

title: Aeropostale End of Season Clearance Sale
description:
Aeropostale takes 70% to 80% off all clearance items as part of its End of Season Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $5, but orders of $75 or more qualify for free shipping.

Note: Select items may be less at Aeropostale via eBay, which has no-minimum free shipping.

title: Energizer Automatic LED Nightlights 2-Pack
description: 13 Deals offers the Energizer Automatic Slim LED Nightlights 2-Pack for $6.46. Coupon code "ENERGIZER1218" cuts the price to $3.49. With free shipping, that's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find by $10. They are sensor activated and measure 4.5" x 2" x 1.5".

title: Armani Exchange Semi-Annual Sale
description: Armani Exchange takes 50% off men's, women's, and kids' items as part of its Semi-Annual Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $7.50, or spend $100 or more for free shipping.

title: Jos. A. Bank Men's 1905 Cotton Stripe Sweater
description: Jo.s A. Bank offers its Jos. A. Bank Men's 1905 Collection Cotton Stripe Sweater in Navy or Cream for $23.99. Plus, Bank Account Rewards members get free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's tied with last week's mention at $76 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from S to XL.

title: REI Holiday Clearance
description: REI takes up to 50% off select items as part of its Holiday Clearance. Plus, save 50% off new markdowns at REI Garage. Shipping adds $5.99, although orders of $50 or more bag free shipping. (Some large items may incur additional handling charges; in-store pickup is available for most items.) Choose from categories including outerwear, apparel, accessories, and more. Deal ends January 1.

title: Husky 10- and 11-Piece Drive Socket Sets
description:
Home Depot discounts a selection of Husky 10- and 11-piece drive socket sets to $6.88 with free shipping, as listed below. Each is $3 off list and the lowest price we could find. The sets:
  • Husky 11-Piece 1/4" Metric Drive Socket and Ratchet Set for $6.88 (pictured)
  • Husky 11-Piece 1/4" SAE Drive Socket Set for $6.88
  • Husky 10-Piece 3/8" Metric Drive Socket Set for $6.88
  • Husky 10-Piece 3/8" SAE Drive Socket Set for $6.88

title: Garmin Vivosmart HR Activity Tracker
description: Verizon Wireless continues to offer the Garmin Vivosmart HR Activity Tracker in Black for $49.99 with free shipping. That's tied with tied last week's mention as the lowest price we've seen for it in any condition. (It's also the best deal now by $28.) It monitors heart rate, calories burned, distance traveled, steps taken, floors climbed, and hours slept. It features a 160x68 always-on touchscreen LCD, Bluetooth, clock function, smart notifications, silicon band, water resistance to 164 feet, and battery life up to five days.

title: Citybug 2 Electric Scooter with Lights
description: Jet.com offers the Brookstone Citybug 2 Electric Scooter with Lights in Black for $199.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from last week as the lowest price we could find now by $100. It features a push and pull acceleration system, headlight, and tail light.

title: Jos. A. Bank Men's Classic Tailored Fit Suit
description: Jos. A. Bank offers its Jos. A. Bank Men's Classic Collection Tailored Fit Suit in Grey or Charcoal for $55.20 with free shipping. That's tied with last week's mention, $145 off list, and a low price for a men's suit in general. It's available in select regular and long sizes from 37 to 41. Deal ends January 1.

title: Refurb MacBook Air Broadwell i5 12" Laptop
description:
Altatac via eBay offers the refurbished Apple MacBook Air Broadwell Core i5 1.6GHz 11.6" Laptop for $549.95 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from two weeks ago as the lowest price we've seen. (It's $185 under the best deal for a new unit.) It features an Intel Core i5 1.6GHz Broadwell dual-core processor, 11.6" 1366x768 LCD, 4GB RAM, 128GB flash storage, webcam, 802.11ac wireless, Bluetooth 4.0, USB 3.0, Thunderbolt, and Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite.

Note: A 90-day warranty applies, although it's unclear who backs it.

title: Microsoft Store Countdown to 2018 Game Sale
description:
For Xbox Live Gold members only, Microsoft Store takes up to 65% off a selection of game downloads for Xbox One furing its Countdown to 2018 Sale. (Not a member? Sign up for a month for just $1.) Deal ends January 4. A couple of best bets:
  • Deux Ex: Mankind Divided for Xbox One for $9 (low by $4)
  • For Honor: Standard Edition for Xbox One for $19.80 (pictured, low by $10)

title: Theefun 1:16 Rock Crawler 2.4Ghz RC Car
description: SkySeaCloud via Amazon offers the Theefun 1:16 Rock Crawler 2.4Ghz Remote Control Car for $59.99. Coupon code "264L7LDQ" cuts that to $35.99. With free shipping, that's $24 off and the lowest price we could find. It features anti-skid wheels, shockproof suspension, 4WD, and rechargeable battery. One AA battery is required. Deal ends December 31.

title: Elechomes Big Mouth 900W Juicer
description: SkySeaCloud via Amazon offers the Elechomes Big Mouth 900-watt Juicer for $79.99. Coupon code "BM5SK2CF" cuts it to $54.99. With free shipping, that's $5 under last week's mention, $25 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. It features a 900-watt motor, 3" chute, juice container which doubles as a serving pitcher, and overheat protection. Deal ends January 5.

title: Syma X56W Camera Quadcopter Drone
description: RC Drone via Amazon offers the Syma X56W Camera Quadcopter Drone in Black or White for $59.90. Coupon code "T2FIL4OI" cuts the price to $39.53. With free shipping, that's $2 under our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find now by $10. It features 6-axis stability, has a flight time of seven minutes, and can be controlled with the remote or with a smartphone. Deal ends December 31.

title: Southwest Rapid Rewards® Plus Credit Card
Kindle Goodreads eBooks at Amazon
description: As one of its daily deals, Amazon cuts up to 80% off a selection of Kindle Goodreads Choice Awards finalists' eBooks, with prices starting at $1.99. Choose from titles such as Timothy Zahn's Star Wars: Thrawn, Neil DeGrasse Tyson's Astrophysics for People in a Hurry, and Kate Moore's The Radium Girls: The Dark Story of America's Shining Women. Deal ends today.

title: SiliconDust HDHomeRun Quatro TV Tuner
description: As one of its daily deals, Best Buy offers the SiliconDust HDHomeRun Connect Quatro TV Tuner for $99.99 with free shipping. That's $50 off and tied with last week's mention as a great deal for this recently-released model. It features four tuners to stream up to four channels at once via your existing OTA antenna. More information is available here. Deal ends today.

title: Cooking Kindle eBooks
description: Amazon offers a selection of cooking Kindle eBooks for free. Each is at least a buck off list and the lowest price we could find. Discounted titles include Five Ingredient Cookbook: Easy Recipes in 5 Ingredients or Less (pictured), BBQ Party: 50 Essential Smoking Meat Recipes, and Cast Iron Cookbook: Ultimate Cast Iron Cooking Recipes.

title: Gevalia Espresso K-Cup 100-Pack
description:
Amazon offers the Gevalia Espresso K-Cup 100-Pack in Signature Blend or Colombia for $31.18 with free shipping via the steps below. That's $8 less than you'd pay in local warehouse clubs. To get this deal:
  1. View the Gevalia Espresso K-Cup 100-Pack for $38.98
  2. clip the 15% off coupon on the product page
  3. check out via Subscribe & Save for a final price of $31.18 with free shipping
Be sure to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for further shipments.

title: Refurb Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Headphones II
description:
Bose offers its refurbished Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Over-Ear Wireless Headphones II in Black for $149.95 with free shipping. That's tied with our refurb mention from two weeks ago and $49 below the best price we could find for a new pair. They feature a 30-foot range and up to 15 hours of play time.

A 1-year Bose warranty applies, same as new items.

title: Tools of the Trade 8-Qt. Casserole w/ Lid
description: As one of its daily deals, Macy's offers the Tools of the Trade Stainless Steel 8-Quart Casserole with Lid for $17.99. This $10 mail-in rebate cuts that to $7.99. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the backorder shipping delay, which would likely negate the rebate. That's $2 under last month's mention, $52 off list, and the lowest price we could find. It's oven safe to 450° Fahrenheit. Deal ends today.

title: Philips Hue White Smart Bulb Starter Kit
description: As one of its daily deals, Best Buy via eBay offers the Philips Hue White Smart Bulb Starter Kit for $59.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from a month ago and the lowest price we could find now by $40. It comes with four LED bulbs and one bridge; plus, it features voice and app control. Deal ends today.

title: Columbia Men's Mountainside Full Zip Vest
description: Columbia offers its Columbia Men's Mountainside Full Zip Vest in Navy or Graphite for $49.98. Coupon code "COLDEC60" drops that to $39.98. Plus, Greater Rewards members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to sign up.) That's $10 below our mention from last week and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $40.) It's available in sizes S to XXL. Deal ends December 31.

title: Bacati Pin Dots 42x84" Curtain Panel
description: Walmart offers the Bacati Pin Dots 42" x 84" Curtain Panel in Yellow for $8.57. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. That's the lowest price we could find by $21. It features a 1" header with a 3" rod pocket.

title: Wells Fargo Cash Wise Visa® Card
Gerber Mini Paraframe Fine Edge Folding Knife
description: Walmart offers the Gerber Mini Paraframe Fine Edge Clip Folding Knife for $7.97. Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. (Amazon charges the same with free shipping via Prime.) That's tied with our October mention and the lowest price we could find by $10. It features a 2.22" blade, frame lock mechanism, and pocket clip.

title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Modern Performance Pants
description: Macy's offers the Tommy Hilfiger Men's Modern-Fit Solid Stretch Performance Pants in Khaki for $29.99 with free shipping. That's $70 off and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes 32x30 to 40x30. Deal ends December 30.

title: LeapFrog Learning Friends School Play Set
description: Walmart offers the LeapFrog Learning Friends Play and Discover School Play Set for $9.97. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's $5 off and the lowest price we could find. It features five different school activities, three interactive learning friends, more than 70 stories, songs, and phrases, and moveable snack time table. Three AA batteries are required but not included.

title: Lincoln Logs Frosty Falls Ranch
description: Walmart offers the Lincoln Logs Frosty Falls Ranch for $22.97. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's the lowest price we could find by $12. It includes a cowboy figure, horse, and 120 pieces.

title: Tomodachi 12pc Titanium-Coated Cutlery Set
description: Sam's Club offers its members the Tomodachi 12-Piece Titanium-Coated Cutlery Set in Copper or Black for $19.98 with free shipping. (Non-members must pay a $2 surcharge.) That's the lowest price we could find by $8. The set includes a 8" chef's knife, 8" bread knife, 6" utility knife, 5" tomato knife, 4" citrus knife, 3.5" paring knife, and matching blade guards for each knife.

title: Verizon Wear24 Bluetooth 4G LTE Smartwatch
description: Shophotdeals1 via eBay offers the Verizon Wear24 42mm Bluetooth WiFi + 4G LTE Smartwatch in Gold for $73.97 with free shipping. That's $5 under our mention from two weeks ago and the lowest price we could find now by $26. It features a 35mm 480x480 AMOLED display, 768MB RAM, 4GB storage, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, stainless steel case, silicone rubber band, and Android Wear 2.0 OS.

title: Ryobi 18V High Power Volume Inflator
description: Home Depot offers the Ryobi 18-volt High Power Volume Inflator for $19.97. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's tied with last month's mention and the lowest price we could find by $14. It can inflate a standard twin air mattress in 45 seconds.

title: Werner 5-Foot Fiberglass Ladder
description: Lowe's offers the Werner 5-Foot Fiberglass Ladder in Camo for $27.60. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the $79 delivery fee. That's $45 under the best price we could find for a similar ladder elsewhere, although we saw it for $4 less three weeks ago. It features a 225-lb. capacity and slip-resistant steps.

title: Nike Men's SB Trainerendor Shoes
description: Nike offers its Nike Men's SB Trainerendor Shoes in Black/White for $54.97. In-cart, that drops to $41.23. Plus, Nike+ members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $29, although we saw them for a buck less last month. They're available in select sizes from 8 to 11. Deal ends January 4.

title: 4 Months of DirecTV Now w/ Apple TV 4K 32GB
description:
At DirecTV Now, prepay for four months of DirecTV Now service for $140 ($35/month) and receive the recently-released Apple TV 4K 32GB Media Receiver for free via the steps below. It features Apple's A10X Fusion chip, which is 2x faster and provides 4x GPU performance over the previous generation Apple TV. It also supports 4K HDR content via HDR 10 and Dolby Vision. This deal includes the "Live a Little" package from DirecTV Now, which offers over 60 channels to stream live, with many shows available on demand. After four months, you'll be billed $35/month for the service, but you may cancel at any time. To get this deal:
  1. On this page, click "Redeem & Stream"
  2. create your account
  3. select the "Live a Little" tab and click "Continue with this plan"
  4. on the add-ons page, click "Skip for now"
  5. choose the Apple TV 4K and click "Add to plan", then click "Continue"
  6. you'll see a final price of $140 on the checkout page
Note: You must use Chrome or Safari as your browser to get this deal.

title: Refurb New Nintendo 3DS XL Console
description:
Nintendo via eBay offers its refurbished New Nintendo 3DS XL Game Console in Black for $160 with free shipping. That's $30 under the lowest price we could find for a new unit, although we saw a refurb with a $15 gift card for $160 three weeks ago. It features Amiibo support and is compatible with all Nintendo DS games.

Note: A 1-year Nintendo warranty applies.

title: KitchenAid 1.7-Liter Electric Kettle
description: Walmart offers the KitchenAid 1.7-Liter Electric Kettle with LED Display in Brushed Stainless Steel for $64.99 with free shipping. (Amazon charges the same.) That's the lowest price we could find by $20. It features a clear water window with blue LED and 30-minute hold temperature function that maintains the temperature while on the base.

title: Woolrich Roaring Branch Jacquard Blanket
description: American Eagle Outfitters offers the Woolrich Roaring Branch Jacquard Blanket for $59.99 with free shipping. That's $137 off list and the lowest price we could find. It measures 50" x 70".

title: Accent Furniture at Macy's
description:
Macy's cuts up to 70% off a selection of accent furniture with prices starting at $66.20. Shipping starts around $10.95 and surcharges may apply. Discounted items include chairs, side tables, chaise lounges, and loveseats. A couple best bets:
  • Ander Accent Chair for $89 + $11 s&h ($50 off)
  • Coryn Fabric Accent Chair for $159 + $26 s&h (pictured, $166 off)

title: OXO Good Grips Spring-Loaded Poultry Shears
description: Amazon offers Prime members the OXO Good Grips Spring-Loaded Poultry Shears for $19.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $5. They feature stainless-steel blades that separate for cleaning.

title: L.L.Bean Kids' Lunch Box
description: L.L.Bean offers the L.L.Bean Kids' Lunch Box in six colors ( Nordic Blue Peace Daisy pictured) for $10.99. Coupon code "EXTRA25" cuts that to $8.24. With free shipping, that's $12 off list and the lowest price we've seen for an L.L. Bean lunch box. It features insulation, zippered closures, and a mesh pocket. Deal ends January 1.

title: Pokémon Clip 'N' Carry Poké Ball Belt
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Pokémon Clip 'N' Carry Poké Ball Belt for $8.69 with free shipping. That's about 50 cents under our mention from ten days ago and the lowest price we could find now by $16. It includes one adjustable belt, one Pikachu figure, one Poké ball, and one net ball.

title: T-Fal Airbake 16x14" Cookie Sheet
description: Walmart offers the T-Fal Airbake 16x14" Cookie Sheet for $9.87. (Amazon charges the same.) Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by $10. It purportedly decreases bake times by up to 15 percent.

title: Papa John's coupon
description:
Papa John's cuts 50% off regular-price orders, including wings, via coupon code "2018DEAL". That's tied with our Black Friday mention as the best percent-off discount we've seen from Papa John's. (Normally the discount is restricted to just pizzas.) Availability varies by location; some exclusions apply.

See all Papa John's Coupons.

title: Liberty Mutual Auto Insurance
description:
Liberty Mutual offers discounted rates on policies for teen drivers. You may qualify for rate reductions if your teen is:
  • Under the age of 21 and completes a qualifying driver training program
  • living at a school more than 100 miles from your home and occasionally drives your vehicle
  • under the age of 25, who achieve at least a B (3.0) average

title: Tools of the Trade 1.5qt Stainless Tea Kettle
description: As one of its daily deals, Macy's offers the Tools of the Trade 1.5-Quart Stainless Steel Tea Kettle for $4.99. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $20 off list and the lowest price we've seen. It whistles when water is boiling and features an easy-grip handle. Deal ends December 30.

title: Upcoming: Block Calendar Kids' Workshop
description: On January 5 from 9 am to 12 pm local time, participating Home Depot retail stores will offer a Block Calendar Kids' Workshop for free. (Select a store to register.) Kids will get to build a block calendar and also receive an apron and pin.

title: Nike Women's Celso Ultra Thong Flip Flops
description: Nike offers its Nike Women's Celso Ultra Thong Flip Flops in Platinum/White for $14.97. In cart, that drops to $11.23. Plus, Nike+ members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $10, although we saw them for a buck less the week of Black Friday. They're available in sizes 6 to 12.

title: Fizzics Waytap Beer Dispenser
description: Amazon offers the Fizzics Waytap Draft Beer System in Black for $84.99 with free shipping. That's $1 under our March mention and the lowest price we could find by $15. It's compatible with 12-oz. to 25-oz. cans and 12-oz. bottles and requires four AA batteries (not included.)

title: Nike Men's Lebron XIV Low Basketball Shoes
description: Nike offers its Nike Men's Lebron XIV Low Basketball Shoes in Stucco or Black for $89.97. In cart, that drops to $67.48. Plus, Nike+ members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $7, although most stores charge at least $90 (if not closer to list price). They're available in select sizes from 7 to 18.

title: GreCute 18" x 30" Doormat
description: Nomi Park via Amazon offers the GreCute 18" x 30" Doormat in Black for $5.09. Plus, Prime members get free shipping. That's $3 under our October mention, $5 off, and the lowest price we could find. It features vinyl backing.

title: Nike Men's Jordan Ultra.Fly 2 Shoes
description: Nike offers its Nike Men's Jordan Ultra.Fly 2 Basketball Shoes in several colors (Black/Anthracite pictured) for $79.97. In cart, that drops to $59.98. (Villa charges the same in Black/Red.) Plus, Nike+ members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $7. They're available in select sizes from 9 to 13.

title: Rubbermaid TakeAlongs 40pc Food Storage Set
description: Target offers the Rubbermaid TakeAlongs 40-Piece Food Storage Container Set for $8.99. (Amazon has it for the same with a $25 order.) Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping charge. That's a buck under our July mention and the best price we could find by $3. It includes four mini square containers, two mini round containers, four square containers, four bowl containers, two large bowls, and four square containers.

title: Society Den Emery Upholstered Platform Bed
description:
Sam's Club offers its members the Society Den Emery Upholstered Twin Platform Bed in several colors (Teal pictured) for $162.88 with free shipping. (Non-members pay an additional $16.29.) That's the lowest price we could find by $23. It features a chrome silver nailhead trim.

It's also available in Full for $199.88 with free shipping. (Non-members pay an additional $19.99.) That's the lowest price we could find by $10.

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
Metal/Glass Console Table
description: Sam's Club offers its members this Metal/Glass Console Table for $69.99 with free shipping. (Non-members must pay a $7 surcharge.) That's $30 off list and the lowest price we could find. It measures 43" x 15" x 30".

title: GoPro HERO6 Black 4K Action Camera
description: Amazon offers the GoPro HERO6 Black 4K Action Camera for $399.99 with free shipping. That's $49 under our Cyber Monday mention (although that included a $75 B&H gift card) and the lowest outright price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $59, although most retailers charge upwards of $479.) It's waterproof to 33 feet without a housing and features a 2" touchscreen LCD, up to 4K video recording at 60fps, 12-megapixel still image resolution, three microphones, 5GHz WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS (with data overlay via the free Quik desktop app), microSDXC card slot, micro HDMI, and rechargeable Li-ion battery.

title: Serta Luxury Hybrid Shoreway Mattress Set
description:
Sam's Club offers its members the Serta Ultra Luxury Hybrid Shoreway Plush Mattress Queen Set with 5.75" or 9" boxspring for $699 with free white glove delivery. (Delivery includes basic set-up and haul-away. Non-members pay an additional $69.90, so it's better to buy a 1-Year Membership for $45.) That's $600 off and the lowest price we could find, although we saw it for $100 less last week. This smooth-top mattress features a 14.75" profile and hybrid gel memory foam / individually-wrapped coil design. It's compatible with Serta adjustable foundations (sold separately).

It's also available in King or California King for $999 with free shipping. (As above, non-members should purchase a 1-Year Membership for $45 to avoid the $99.90 surcharge.) That's also a tie from three weeks ago, $700 off, and the lowest price we could find.

title: Sperry Men's Star Wars Cloud Duel Shoes
description: Sperry offers its Sperry Men's Star Wars Cloud Duel Slip-On Shoes for $37.48 with free shipping. That's $37 off list and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes 7 to 13.

title: Remington Shortcut Pro Self-Haircut Kit
description: Amazon offers the Remington Shortcut Pro Self-Haircut Kit for $38.49. Clip the $10 off coupon on the product page to cut that to $28.49. With free shipping, that's tied with our mention from last week as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $10.) This 13-piece kit includes a hand-held clipper, nine length-adjusting combs, a cleaning brush, storage/travel pouch, oil, and a charger.

title: Emery Upholstered Chair
description: Sam's Club offers its members the Emery Upholstered Chair in several colors (Natural pictured) for $199.98 with free shipping. (Non-members pay a $20 surcharge.) That's the lowest price we could find by $27. It features straight edge arms and nailhead trim.

title: Mars Halloween Candy 250-Piece Bag
description:
With orders of $25 or more, Amazon offers the Mars Chocolate and More Favorites Halloween Candy Variety Mix 95.1-oz. 250-Piece Bag for $7.80 with free shipping. Provided you've got some other shopping to do at Amazon, that's $8 under our October mention and the lowest price we could find now by $6. It includes fun- and mini-sized Starburst, Skittles, 3 Musketeers, Snickers, and Snickers Peanut Butter Squared candies.

Note: This item is part of Amazon's "add-on" program and can only be purchased with an order of $25 or more.

title: Optimum Nutrition Protein Powder 5-lb. Jar
description:
Amazon offers the Optimum Nutrition 100% Whey Gold Standard Protein Powder 5-lb. Jar in several flavors (Chocolate Mint pictured) for $39.99 with free shipping via the steps below. That's $2 below our mention from Black Friday weeked and the lowest price we could find by $8. It delivers 24g of whey protein per serving. To get this deal:
  1. Select a Optimum Nutrition 100% Whey Gold Standard Protein Powder 5-lb. Jar in flavor for $49.99
  2. clip the 15% off coupon on the product page
  3. order via Subscribe & Save to drop it to $39.99
Note: Be sure to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for further shipments.

title: Alder Creek Executive Gourmet Gift Basket
description: Sam's Club offers its members the Alder Creek Executive Gourmet Gift Basket for $64.91 with free shipping. (Non-members pay a $6.49 surcharge.) That's $20 off list and the lowest price we could find. The basket includes Portlock salmon, Jack Allen Chocolate Eclairs, Lindt Truffles Truffle Cookies, Olli Salumeria Mild Genoa Salami, and more.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
New Nintendo 3DS XL Game Console Bundle
description: Sam's Club offers its members the New Nintendo 3DS XL Game Console in Black bundled with Super Smash Bros. for 3DS, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time for 3DS, and a Nintendo 3DS AC Adapter for $249 with free shipping. (Non-members pay an additional $24.90.) That's $8 under the lowest price we could find for these items sold separately elsewhere. The console features Amiibo support and is compatible with all Nintendo DS games.

title: Civilization III Complete Edition for PC
description: GameStop offers Steam downloads of Sid Meier's Civilization III Complete Edition for Windows for $1.49. That's the lowest price we could find for this classic game now by $4, although we saw it for free in October.

title: Cylen Ventilated Foam Orthopedic Seat Cushion
description: Hulislem via Amazon offers the Cylen Home Ventilated Memory Foam Orthopedic Seat Cushion in Blue for $21.99. Coupon code "6CPWVGSG" drops it to $13.75. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. That's tied with our October mention as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by about $12.) It features memory foam with an activated charcoal-infused bamboo core, an anti-slip bottom, and removable washable cover. Deal ends January 31.

title: Hotel and Ski Packages in Salt Lake City, UT
description: Visit Salt Lake via Dunhill Travel continues to discount a range of hotel stays during ski season with prices starting from $115 per person per night. Plus, many of these properties offer further discounts on ski passes, extra days, and ski shuttles. Hotels include Solitude Resort Lodging, Staybridge Midvale, Snowbird Ski Resort, Hyatt Place Cottonwood, and more. Book this travel deal by December 31 for stays throughout the 2017-2018 ski season.

title: Cruise.com Carnival Cruises Sale
description: Cruise.com via ShermansTravel discounts select Carnival Cruises 2018 Cruises with prices starting from $199 per person. That yields low starting prices for Carnival cruises. Additional fees and blackout dates apply. Save on a range of itineraries, including departures from Miami, Port Canaveral, Jacksonville, and Baltimore. This travel deal ends December 31.

title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein for PC
description: GameStop offers Steam downloads of Return to Castle Wolfenstein for Windows for $1.24. (Steam charges the same.) That's tied with our August mention, a current best by $4, and the lowest price we've seen.

description: Newegg offers the Ubiquiti Networks Unifi Enterprise Gateway Router with Gigabit Ethernet for $109.99. Coupon code "EMCBCCG29" cuts that to $94.99. With free shipping, that's $11 under our August mention and the lowest price we could find now by $15. It features a 500MHz dual-core processor, 512MB RAM, 2GB flash storage, and three Gigabit Ethernet ports. Deal ends January 1.

title: Playmobil Space Shuttle
description: Walmart offers the Playmobil Space Shuttle for $17.95. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. (Amazon, for Prime members only, and Target charge cents less if you prefer those stores.) That's the lowest price we could find by $12. It includes two figures.

title: American Airlines Nationwide Fares
description:
American Airlines via ShermansTravel offers American Airlines Nationwide Roundtrip Fares, with prices starting from $66.39. (On the ShermansTravel landing page, click on "AA.com" in the top paragraph to see this sale.) We found this price departing on January 22, 2018, from Miami, FL, (MIA) with arrival in New Orleans, LA, (MSY) and return on January 26, 2018. That's the lowest price we could find for select routes by at least $39. Book this travel deal by January 31 for travel in January and February 2018.

Prices, dates, and booking details were valid at the time of publication.

title: Barclaycard Arrival Plus™ MasterCard®
Lifesource 20" Heater Fireplace
description: Walmart offers the Lifesource 20" Heater Fireplace for $136.53 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $51. It features LED color change and flame effects, remote control, and measures 36" x 11" x 20".

That's the lowest price we could find by $42. It features an extending hook & crane plus gyro-stabilization. Included are pick-up loads and drop-off points to create missions; six AA batteries are required, but not included.

title: Singapore Airlines Fares to Asia and Europe
description:
Singapore Airlines via DealBase offers select Singapore Airlines Roundtrip Flights to Asia and Europe with prices starting from $498.60. (On the DealBase landing page, click on "Singapore Airlines" in the top line to see this offer; we found this price departing from Los Angeles, CA, (LAX) on January 23, 2018, with arrival in Tokyo, Japan (NRT) and return on January 30.) Also available is the Think Tank Retrospective 7 Digital SLR Camera Shoulder Bag in Sandstone/Leather for $80 with free shipping. (It's available in Gray/Leather for $5 more.) That's the best deal we could find by $58. Its design is similar to the above, except it also features an expandable front pocket that fits tablets up to 10" or laptops up to 11".

(Free shipping normally requires an order of $99 or more.) Deal ends December 30.

title: Victoria Sport Women's Lightweight Sports Bra
description: Victoria's Secret offers its Victoria Sport Women's Lightweight Strappy Sports Bra in several colors (Blue Mercury pictured) for $12.99 plus $8 for shipping. That's $22 off list and the lowest price we could find. It comes in select sizes from 32A to 38DD.

title: Peak Bug Cleaner Windshield Wash 1-Gal Bottle
description: For in-store pickup only and with limited stock varying by ZIP code, Ace Hardware offers the Peak Premium Bug Cleaner with Rain-Off Windshield Wash 1-Gallon Bottle for $2.49. (Click "Check Availability" and select a store to add it to cart.) In cart the price drops to 99 cents. That's tied with our January mention and the lowest price we could find now by $2. This USA-made wash is for use with temperatures above 32°F. It purportedly removes road grime and bugs and helps repel rain away from your windshield. Deal ends January 31, 2018.

title: Grammarly Premium 1-Year Subscription
description: StackSocial offers a Grammarly Premium 1-Year Subscription for $69.98. That's tied with our mention from two weeks ago and $70 less than you'd pay from Grammary direct. This online spell-checker catches mistakes on Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, and more, and offers style and vocabulary suggestions. Deal ends January 5.

title: Bayasolo X1 In-Ear Headphones
description:
TomTop offers the Bayasolo X1 In-Ear Headphones for $5.99. Coupon code "PAE0088WCX" cuts that to $2.99. With free shipping, that's $10 off list and the lowest price we could find. They feature a frequency response of 20Hz to 20kHz, microphone, and in-line controls.

Note: These ship from China and may take up to four weeks to arrive.

title: Theefun 1:10 Simulation Racer RC Car
description: AppelEA via Amazon offers the Theefun 1:10 Simulation Racer RC Car in Red or Blue for $59.99. Coupon code "X5ZVIDMH" cuts it to $35.99. With free shipping, that's $18 under last week's mention, $24 off, and the lowest price we've seen. It goes up to 8 mph and features 100-foot range. Deal ends December 31.

title: LG MiniBeam Home Theatre Projector
description:
Walmart offers the LG MiniBeam Home Theatre Projector in White for $397 with free shipping. (B&H Photo Video has it for about the same.) That's $3 under last week's mention and the lowest price we could find by $133, excluding the mention below. This portable projector features a 1280x720 (720p) native resolution, up to 2.5-hour battery life, Bluetooth, wireless mirroring of a smartphone or tablet, built-in TV tuner, and USB port.

A close price: Dell Small Business has it for $399.99 with free shipping.

title: Best Freebies: Score a Free Month of HBO Now, Plus a $10 Amazon Credit!
description: It's the last weekend of 2017, and no matter how you felt about this year, we bet you could use a freebie. Check out our roundup of the week's best freebie deals to score free HBO for a month, a useful sleep app, and more.

title: Bath & Body Works Semi-Annual Sale
description:
Bath & Body Works takes up to 75% off sitewide during its Semi-Annual Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Plus, cut an extra 20% off via coupon code "DISCOVER20". Shipping adds a flat $5.99 for orders over $10. (Shipping costs $9.99 for orders of $10 or less.) Deal ends December 31.

See all Bath & Body Works Coupons.

title: Degree Women's 2.6-oz. Antiperspirant 4-Pack
description:
Amazon offers the Degree Women's Dry Protection 2.6-oz. Antiperspirant 4-Pack in Pure Clean for $5.19 with free shipping, via the directions below. That's the lowest price we could find for this quantity by $10. To get this deal:
  1. View the Degree Women's Dry Protection 2.6-oz. Antiperspirant 4-Pack for $7.99
  2. clip the on-page coupon
  3. checkout via Subscribe & Save for a final price of $5.19

title: LG 4.2 1,000W 3D Blu-ray Home Theater System
description: Dell Small Business offers the LG 4.2-Channel 1,000-watt 3D Blu-ray Home Theater System for $339 with free shipping. That's tied with last week's mention as the lowest outright price we've seen. (It's the best today by $160.) The system includes two Tallboy 39" 500-watt wired speakers with built-in subwoofers, and a 3D smart Blu-ray player that features Ethernet, LG Smart TV (with access to Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Instant Video, etc.), Bluetooth, an FM radio tuner, USB, and one HDMI input.

title: Oneida Nadine 14-oz. Crystal Wine Goblet
description: Oneida offers its Oneida Nadine 14-oz. Crystal Wine Goblet for $3.99. Coupon code "DEALNEWSFREE" cuts that to $3.19 and bags free shipping. That's a savings of $14 and the lowest price we could find. It's dishwasher-safe. Deal ends December 30.

title: Refurb Nikon KeyMission 170 4K Action Camera
description:
BuyDig offers the refurbished Nikon KeyMission 170 4K WiFi Action Camera for $189 with free shipping. That's $160 under the lowest price we could find for a new unit, although most sellers charge at least $397 for a new one. It's shockproof, freeze-proof, and waterproof to 33 feet without a housing. Features include a 1.5" LCD, 170° wide-angle lens, 4K video recording at 30fps, 8-megapixel still image resolution, microphone, 802.11g wireless, Bluetooth 4.1, microSDXC card slot, micro HDMI, and rechargeable Li-ion battery. Deal ends January 4.

Note: A 90-day Nikon warranty applies.

title: LG Loudr Audio System
description: Dell Small Business offers the LG Loudr Audio System for $129.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find by $6. It features a CD player, AM/FM tuner, Bluetooth, and USB 2.0.

title: 10 Pairs of Aerie Women's Panties
description: Aerie by American Eagle offers 10 pairs of Aerie Women's Panties for $30. Shipping adds $7, or spend $50 or more for free shipping. That's $3.70 per pair and a savings of up to $95. (However, we saw 10 pairs for $35 shipped two weeks ago.) Choose from boybriefs, bikinis, thongs, boyshorts, and cheekies.

title: Pressman Let's Go Fishin' Game
description: Walmart offers the Pressman Let's Go Fishin' Game for $6.67. (Target has it for about the same with pickup.) Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by $3. It requires one C battery (not included).

title: 5 Deals You Need to Know Today: A Record-Low Price for an Amazon Tap
description: Today you can get a refurbished, Amazon-warrantied Tap at an all-time low price, or sink into Bethesda's BioShock-beater Prey, also at its cheapest price yet. Check out these offers and more in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: Samples w/ $2 Amazon Credit
description: For Prime members only, Amazon offers a range of samples bundled with $2 Amazon Credit for $2 each with free shipping. Assuming you'll spend the credit, that essentially makes these samples free. Save on toothpaste, groceries, beauty items, and more.

title: VIDEO: Our Champagne Taste Test Finds the Best Bubbles for Your Buck!
description: Nothing says "Happy new year" like the popping of a cork, but are there any sparkling wines that are good and a good price? Find out in our video taste test!

title: 9 Ways to Eat Healthy on a Budget in 2018
description: Want to eat healthier and save more money in the new year? Contrary to popular belief, those two things aren't mutually exclusive. We rounded up a few tips to help you get started on your 2018 resolutions.

title: 7 New Year's Resolutions That Will Save You Money
description: Most sites will tell you to quit smoking or stop buying Starbucks every day if you want to save money in the new year. Here are seven different New Year's resolutions for you to consider, all of which will save you money in 2018.

title: The 11 Best Things to Buy Before (and Immediately After) Christmas
description: Black Friday makes November a prime time for deals, but December still has a lot to offer. We've scoured the DealNews archives from years gone by, to guide you in your quest for the best purchases for December.
